resource.title: Tutorials by Alan Zucconi
resource.body: !format (( [https://twitter.com/AlanZucconi][Alan Zucconi] is an independent developer, lecturer, author, and shader master. His blog contains dozens of in-depth tutorials focusing on topics from computer graphics to machine learning, with many examples based in Unity. )) (( Most posts and tutorials require a fairly solid foundation when it comes to programming, though many offer great introductions to more complex topics, [http://www.alanzucconi.com/2015/06/10/a-gentle-introduction-to-shaders-in-unity3d/][such as writing shaders]. )) (( Early access to tutorials and additional resources can also be obtained by [https://www.patreon.com/AlanZucconi][supporting Alan on Patreon]! ))
